entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Occasional drifting snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:36 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 9:36 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
